title: SURAZO Premium Leather Back Case Compatible with Apple iPhone 13 Pro - [Compatible with MagSafe] – Slim Magnetic Cover – Genuine Italian Handcrafted Leather Bumper (Ornament Turquoise)
features: ✅ COMPATIBILITY | SURAZO Handcrafted Premium Leather Phone Case is compatible with iPhone 13 Pro (6.1 inch). Please make sure you order the right size case for your phone. This case doesn’t fit either iPhone 13 Mini (5.4 inch) or iPhone 13 (6.1 inch) or iPhone 13 Pro Max (6.7 inch), or any other previous iPhone models
✅ A GENUINE LEATHER PHONE CASE - This leather folio case flaunts a perfect balance of luxury and protection with its Italian leather material giving your device a superior look and feel.

✅ PREMIUM QUALITY | Handcrafted of High Quality Cowhide Full-Grain Leather with exceptional craftsmanship gained by experience of years. Well-finished exquisite stitches offer this carrying pocket not only long lasting durability but also an elegant look
✅ EXACT-FIT - iPhone 13 Pro phone case; Perfect protection, shock absorbent TPU totally protect your device from impact, drops and shocks; Offers good grip and comfort with its leather outside finish

✅ SUPER MAGNETIC ATTRACTION - Particularly designed for iPhone 13 Pro, the phone case is compatible with Magsafe chargers and other Qi Wireless chargers without signal influence. Built-in strong magnet, the iPhone 13 Pro case will not fall off no matter how it rotates with super adsorption capacity. The perfectly aligned magnetic attraction makes wireless charging faster and more stable.
description: SURAZO Back Case is engineered from the ground up to be a slim case that offers maximum protection. The ultra-efficient, impact-absorbing case uses Airoshock technology to offer incredible drop protection for Apple iPhone. SURAZO cases and its Airoshock technology will protect your phone even if you drop it multiple times. This impressive material absorbs the energy of drops and dampens the impact by slowing down the rate of deceleration, this allows the cases to be super slim yet extremely protective. This combination with our unique material blend provides cushion to the cases, absorbing impact from a fall, so that your phone remains safe. Screen protection - our team took it a step further and the cases will protect your phone even if you drop it screen-face down. How? Every case has a raised front lip to help prevent the screen from hitting the ground keeping it protected. All SURAZO products come with a Limited Lifetime Warranty. COMPATIBILITY – This case is compatible with the iPhone 13 PRO version of the 2021 release GENUINE LEATHER - The leather cover is finished in luxury cowhide leather to make the case tactile to touch and elegant in aesthetic. SLIM & PERFECT FITS - Precise cutouts for easy access to all ports, not interfere with microphone using; slim but protective, add no extra bulk to your phone FULL BODY PROTECTION - 2mm raised edges around the camera and 1mm raised edges screen to help protect against Scratching and Dropping, durable leather cover for iPhone GOOD CHOICE FOR GIFT-This case is made with high-quality leather, it is luxury and upscale, except buy for yourself, it is also a good choice as a gift SUPER MAGNETIC ATTRACTION - Particularly designed for iPhone 13 Pro, the phone case is compatible with Magsafe chargers and other Qi Wireless chargers without signal influence.
